title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in table filter, an error message is displayed on the report page.
EB: Save and preview. Expected result: Filter works without errors. Actual result: There are errors on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)) detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the report. 2. Apply a table filter using the value new Date("3/2/2005"). 3. Save and preview the report. 4. Observe the error message on the report page.
